verses.verse: Be <WG1096> ye <WG3402> therefore <WG3767> followers <WG3402> of God <WG2316>, as <WG5613> dear <WG27> children <WG5043>;

And <WG2532> walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> love <WG26>, as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> hath loved <WG25> us <WG2248>, and <WG2532> hath given <WG3860> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> us <WG2257> an offering <WG4376> and <WG2532> a sacrifice <WG2378> to God <WG2316> for <WG1519> a sweetsmelling <WG2175> savour <WG3744>.

But <WG2532> fornication <WG4202>, and <WG1161> all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167>, or <WG2228> covetousness <WG4124>, let it <WG3687> not be once <WG3366> named <WG3687> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, as <WG2531> becometh <WG4241> saints <WG40>;

Neither <WG2532> filthiness <WG151>, nor <WG2532> foolish talking <WG3473>, nor <WG2228> jesting <WG2160>, which <WG3588> are <WG433> not <WG3756> convenient <WG433>: but <WG235> rather <WG3123> giving of thanks <WG2169>.

For <WG1063> this <WG5124> ye know <WG2075> <WG1097>, that <WG3754> no <WG3756> <WG3956> whoremonger <WG4205>, nor <WG2228> unclean person <WG169>, nor <WG2228> covetous man <WG4123>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> an idolater <WG1496>, hath <WG2192> any inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of Christ <WG5547> and <WG2532> of God <WG2316>.

Let <WG538> no man <WG3367> deceive <WG538> you <WG5209> with vain <WG2756> words <WG3056>: for <WG1063> because <WG1223> of these things <WG5023> cometh <WG2064> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> upon <WG1909> the children <WG5207> of disobedience <WG543>.
Be <WG1096> not <WG3361> ye <WG1096> therefore <WG3767> partakers <WG4830> with them <WG846>.

For <WG1063> ye were <WG2258> sometimes <WG4218> darkness <WG4655>, but <WG1161> now <WG3568> are ye light <WG5457> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>: walk <WG4043> as <WG5613> children <WG5043> of light <WG5457>:
(For <WG1063> the fruit <WG2590> of the Spirit <WG4151> is in <WG1722> all <WG3956> goodness <WG19> and <WG2532> righteousness <WG1343> and <WG2532> truth <WG225>;)
Proving <WG1381> what <WG5101> is <WG2076> acceptable <WG2101> unto the Lord <WG2962>.
And <WG2532> have <WG4790> no <WG3361> fellowship <WG4790> with the unfruitful <WG175> works <WG2041> of darkness <WG4655>, but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> <WG2532> reprove <WG1651> them.
For <WG1063> it is <WG2076> a shame <WG149> even <WG2532> to speak <WG3004> of those things <WG2931> which are done <WG1096> of <WG5259> them <WG846> in secret <WG2931>.

But <WG1161> all things <WG3956> that are reproved <WG1651> are made manifest <WG5319> by <WG5259> the light <WG5457>: for <WG1063> whatsoever <WG3956> doth make manifest <WG5319> is <WG2076> light <WG5457>.

Wherefore <WG1352> he saith <WG3004>, Awake thou <WG1453> that sleepest <WG2518>, and <WG2532> arise <WG450> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> shall give <WG2017> thee <WG4671> light <WG2017>.
See <WG991> then <WG3767> that <WG4459> ye walk <WG4043> circumspectly <WG199>, not <WG3361> as <WG5613> fools <WG781>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> wise <WG4680>,
Redeeming <WG1805> the time <WG2540>, because <WG3754> the days <WG2250> are <WG1526> evil <WG4190>.
Wherefore <WG1223> <WG5124> be ye <WG1096> not <WG3361> unwise <WG878>, but <WG235> understanding <WG4920> what <WG5101> the will <WG2307> of the Lord <WG2962> is.
And <WG2532> be <WG3182> not <WG3361> drunk <WG3182> with wine <WG3631>, wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> is <WG2076> excess <WG810>; but <WG235> be filled <WG4137> with <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>;

Speaking <WG2980> to yourselves <WG1438> in psalms <WG5568> and <WG2532> hymns <WG5215> and <WG2532> spiritual <WG4152> songs <WG5603>, singing <WG103> and <WG2532> making melody <WG5567> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> to the Lord <WG2962>;

Giving thanks <WG2168> always <WG3842> for <WG5228> all things <WG3956> unto God <WG2316> and <WG2532> the Father <WG3962> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;
Submitting yourselves <WG5293> one to another <WG240> in <WG1722> the fear <WG5401> of God <WG2316>.
Wives <WG1135>, submit yourselves <WG5293> unto your own <WG2398> husbands <WG435>, as <WG5613> unto the Lord <WG2962>.

For <WG3754> the husband <WG435> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776> of the wife <WG1135>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> Christ <WG5547> is the head <WG2776> of the church <WG1577>: and <WG2532> he <WG846> is <WG2076> the saviour <WG4990> of the body <WG4983>.

Therefore <WG235> as <WG5618> the church <WG1577> is subject <WG5293> unto Christ <WG5547>, so <WG3779> <WG2532> let the wives <WG1135> be to their own <WG2398> husbands <WG435> in <WG1722> every thing <WG3956>.

Husbands <WG435>, love <WG25> your <WG1438> wives <WG1135>, even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> the church <WG1577>, and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> it <WG846>;
That <WG2443> he <WG846> might sanctify <WG37> and cleanse it <WG2511> with the washing <WG3067> of water <WG5204> by <WG1722> the word <WG4487>,

That <WG2443> he might present <WG3936> it <WG846> to himself <WG1438> a glorious <WG1741> church <WG1577>, not <WG3361> having <WG2192> spot <WG4696>, or <WG2228> wrinkle <WG4512>, or <WG2228> any <WG5100> such thing <WG5108>; but <WG235> that <WG2443> it should be <WG5600> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> without blemish <WG299>.

So <WG3779> ought <WG3784> men <WG435> to love <WG25> their <WG1438> wives <WG1135> as <WG5613> their own <WG1438> bodies <WG4983>. He that loveth <WG25> his <WG1438> wife <WG1135> loveth <WG25> himself <WG1438>.

For <WG1063> no man <WG3762> ever yet <WG4218> hated <WG3404> his own <WG1438> flesh <WG4561>; but <WG235> nourisheth <WG1625> and <WG2532> cherisheth <WG2282> it <WG846>, even as <WG2531> <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> the church <WG1577>:
For <WG3754> we are <WG2070> members <WG3196> of his <WG846> body <WG4983>, of <WG1537> his <WG846> flesh <WG4561>, and <WG2532> of <WG1537> his <WG846> bones <WG3747>.

For <WG473> this cause <WG5127> shall <WG2641> a man <WG444> leave <WG2641> his <WG846> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> mother <WG3384>, and <WG2532> shall be joined <WG4347> unto <WG4314> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> they two <WG1417> shall be <WG2071> one <WG1519> <WG3391> flesh <WG4561>.
This <WG5124> is <WG2076> a great <WG3173> mystery <WG3466>: but <WG1161> I <WG1473> speak <WG3004> concerning <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> and <WG1519> <WG2532> the church <WG1577>.

Nevertheless <WG4133> <WG2532> let <WG25> every one <WG1520> <WG1538> of you <WG5210> in particular <WG2596> so <WG3779> love <WG25> his <WG1438> wife <WG1135> even as <WG5613> himself <WG1438>; and <WG1161> the wife <WG1135> see that <WG2443> she reverence <WG5399> her husband <WG435>.
